item.title: Creating a Microsoft Management Console for our local Windows-based, Apache server
item.description: In a previous tutorials, we discussed how to access the Services control panel from Windows. In this tutorial, we'll be setting up a custom console that will provide us an easy way to access both our Services control panel, an Event Viewer, as well as other management tools.
